channel.title: maGaming RSS Feed - remapradio_com
channel.description: A cleaned-up version of the original gaming feed for remapradio_com

item.title: This Week at Remap
item.content:encoded:
Is it possible to feel better and worse about your favorite sports team at the same time? We're on winning streak and yet I'm not sure if my quarterback knows how to throw the ball. Surely, nothing could go wrong after having a 4-2 record, right? Also, I realize this is very petty, but I took absolute delight in watching the Brewers get swept by the Dodgers after they were petty to us. The Dodgers repeating might end up in a baseball lockout, but I'll take it for now.

-pk, whose new 3D printer is mostly printing accessories for dolls

  • PODCAST: Remap Hotline – Gex vs. Salazzle. Robert Redford vs. Will Ferrell. A one-story garage vs. a two-story garage. What does it all mean? Patrick, Rob, and Chia dive into the subscriber question bucket to ponder things like dad movies, typewriters, video game lizards, and much more.
  • STREAM: Road to Empress [Part 4] – We actually just wrapped this stream up, and the YouTube archive will be up later. Wild, wild stuff happened here.
  • STREAM: Steam Next Fest Demos – We'll see if Chia is up for this; it will only be a day after coming back from their overseas trip. And yes, I know that Next Fest is ending today, but we've nabbed a bunch of games to check out anyway.
  • PODCAST: Remap Radio – Lineup TBD! Mostly we're waiting to see if Janet is coming back.
  • ARTICLE: Letter Series – Subject TBD. How can I make it about Silksong again?

If you have any support issues, send details to support@remapradio.com

Patrick Klepek (he/him) is an editor at Remap. In another life, he worked on horror movie sets, but instead, he also runs Crossplay, a newsletter about parenting and video games. You can follow him on Twitter, Threads, Mastodon, and Bluesky.
